408
072-204b @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rwa dza b+he rI gA thA/ /bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i rabs/ /thams cad legs par 'dus nas su/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha yi lha/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ / dge slong rnams ni gcig la gcig /kha stobs la sogs rnams kyis 'gying / /dge slong tshig ngan 'don pa da ga /drang srong chen pos gsan pa na/ /de phyir thub pas dge 'dun rnams/ /bsdus nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/ /khyed cag kha stobs la sogs pas/ / gcig la gcig ni 'tshe byed pa/ /khyim nas khyim med rab byung dang / /de dag 'thun pa ma yin no/ /rtag tu yang dag dga' byed pa'i/ /chos drug gang yin la 'jug pa/ /'di ni khyim nas khyim med par/ /rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'thun/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /'tshe ba med par ngas bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar byang chub don gnyer ba/ /dge slong nga las 'di nyon cig /shes rab ldan pa'i mi yis 'di/ /thos nas sdig pa rnam spongs la/ /grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i chos la spyad par gyis/ /sngon gyi

409
072-205a spun drung gyur pa yi/ /klu yi rgyal po gnyis byung ba/ /gcig gi ming ni rnga zhes bya/ /gnyis pa nye rnga zhes bya'o/ /gnyis ka srog gcod las ldog cing / /tshul khrims ldan zhing dbang chen grags/ /klu yi skye gnas la smod cing / /mi yi srid pa 'dod par gyur/ /tshul ldan mang du thos pa yi/ /dge sbyong bram ze mthong ba dang / /mi yi tshul du bsgyur nas ni/ /bsnyen bkur dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang / /bcu bzhi bco lnga gang yin pa/ /de la yan lag brgyad pa yi/ /gso sbyong la ni legs mnyam 'jog /de gnyis sngon gyi gnas spangs nas/ /yul gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / /de dang nye ba'i gnas de na/ /rnga sgra zhes bya'i klu gnas so/ /klu yi skyes mchog spun gnyis po/ /de gnyis 'ong bar des shes nas/ /khengs shing khros pa'i yid kyis su/ /du ba can gyi dbugs 'byin cing / /khyed gnyis chos spyod ma yin te/ /g.yon can tshul ngan 'chos pa'o zhes/ /rnga sgras tshig ni rtsub mo yis/ /yang dang yang du skrod par byed/ /dman pas bskrad pa thos pa dang / /nye rnga rab tu khros gyur te/ /de tshe phu bo rnga la ni/ /tshig rnams kyis ni go byas pa/ /kye rnga mi yi 'jig rten dag 'di na/ /tshig ngan mngon du smra bas gdung byed cing / /sbal zan chu yi 'gram na skyes pa yis/ /mche ba gdug pas bdag cag skrod par byed/ /'di ni chu nang dud 'gro rnams la 'tshe/ /thang la mi rnams la yang 'tshe bar byed/ /gtso bo gal te bdag la bzod mchis kyang / /tshig ngan smra la yid ni bzod mi nus/ /deng ni 'di yi grong khyer dang / /pho brang gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste/ /rnga sgra gtan nas blangs nas su/ /'di nas bdag cag 'dong bar bya/ /klu yi rgyal po stobs po che/ /de yis nu bo'i tshig thos nas/ /yid la 'bab par byed pa yi/ /tshigs bcad 'di skad smras te bsgo/ /gang gis khyim du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing / /bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs gyur pa/ /de la yid kyis gnod par mi bsam ste/ /byas pa gzo ba skyes bu dam pas bsngags/ /ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis/ /yud tsam

410
072-205b zhig kyang legs 'gebs de'i/ /lo ma'ang bcad par mi bya na/ /yal ga ljon shing smos ci dgos/ /nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung / /slar yang skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /lag pa rlon bcad phyir yang mi skye ltar/ /grogs la 'khu bas yun ring bde mi thob/ / skye bo ngan pa yun ring mchod byas shing / /bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang / /des ni nges par grogs po spong 'gyur te/ /glang chen gyis ni ko'u shi'i spyil bu bzhin/ /ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel 'gyur ltar/ /mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa/ /de yi mdza' bshes brtan par mi 'gyur te/ /shing shun tshon gyis ras dkar btsos pa bzhin/ /gal te mkhas pas dgra bo dag /mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na/ /sems la skyon ni med byas dang / /de nyid kyis ni der gnod 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang / /sa rnams bdag gi khur min gyi/ /byas pa mi gzo gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gi khur chen yin/ /mi gang sems ni mi rgod cing / /byas pa gzo dang byas pa tshor/ /byas pa chud gzon mi byed pa/ /de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/ /chos bde byams pa bde ba ste/ /'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bzhin/ /grogs la 'khu ba med pa dang / /nga snyems nga rgyal zad pa bde/ /khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che/ /sdig pa'i grogs po sten pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rgol byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig /de phyir khengs par mi bya ste/ /khro ba rnam par spang bar bya/ /khengs dang khro ba 'ongs 'gyur na/ /grags pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang / /nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang / /rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la/ /snying brtse med pa de dag mir mi rung / /rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs te/ /gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na/ /tshig ngan so sor zlog pa la/ /bzod pa chen po bya dgos so/ /rang gi yul na brnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas/ /mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung / /gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas te/ /rang gi yul

411
072-206a yin de dag rang gi mi/ /mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas pa'i tshe/ /chung ma sdug dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong / /ngan pa rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam/ /brnyas thabs byas pa de yang chu bzhin 'thung / /dar ba rnyed pa dga' ba ste/ /rgud pa mod pa yin pa'i phyir/ /sems can dmas par gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gal te nor med phyogs nyung ngam/ /mdza' bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ngam/ /dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams chos min byed pa dang / /'dod pa'i longs spyod mngon dga' zhing / /dad chung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang / /gnod sems mang por gyur pa dang / /gzhan la'ang gdug pa'i tshul ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ / mi rnams dad pa med pa dang / /khwa bzhin mu cor smra ba dang / /sgyu dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / /gtum zhing gzu lums byed pa dang / /bden pa'i chos dang mi ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams ngang tshul ngan pa dang / /log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang / /gtum zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ngo tsha med cing brdzun du smra/ /don med phra ma tshig rtsub dang / /dbyen dang khyal pa smra ba'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ya rabs tshul med shin tu khengs/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'gying ba dang / /phrag dog brkam dang tshul nyams tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gang tshe mi yi rus rnams dang / /rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i/ /mi dang lhan cig 'dug pa na/ /de tshe nga rgyal byar mi rung / /gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/ /gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /sdang bas 'khrug par gyur pa na/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/ /

412
072-206b gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /dman pas bskrad par gyur kyang rung / /shes rab ldan pas de bzod bya/ /kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing / /mdza' bshes ngan dang phrad pa na/ /byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi/ /gnas su mi ngan rten byed med/ /shes rab ldan pas de bas mas/ /mi shes mi dang 'grogs byed kyang / /mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir/ /gzu lums kho nar khro mi bya/ /ji ltar thal bas bkab pa'i me/ /rtswa dang shing gis g.yogs pa la/ /rlung rnams kyis ni legs bus na/ /shin tu rab tu 'bar 'gyur te/ /rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas su/ /chen por mched cing 'bar ba yis/ /rtswa dang gel pa mang po dag /ljon shing chen po sreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam rtog bud shing las/ /byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la/ /phung khrol chen po byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir khro ba byung ba na/ /zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/ /byams pa'i sems la bsgoms nas su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed/ /bstod pa byas na mdza' byed la/ /ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed cing / /mod la yongs su spong byed pa/ / de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gal te 'di na byis pa dag /sgro gshog btogs pa'i bya lta bur/ /blo spangs shes rab ma 'chal na/ /mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni/ /blo gros spangs shing shes 'tshal ba/ / de phyir mkhas pa shes rab can/ /khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsho/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med/ /rjes su gzung phyir phan pa de smra na/ /legs smra yin zhes gzhan gyis cis mi rtogs/ /mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de/ /de nyid dpyad pa legs par mnyan nas su/ /de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang / /gzhan gyi don dag legs par spyod par byed/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam

413
072-207a gyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams kun tu spyod mi 'gyur/ /gal te bde dang sdug bsngal ldan gyur kyang / /rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med/ /blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te/ /rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsub khro mi 'gyur/ / phongs pa'i gnas na mya ngan mi byed pa/ /gzhan gyis gnad la 'bebs par byed re skan/ /ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum pa yi/ /dman pa'i mi rnams la yang ma yin te/ /bar ma'i gnas la sten par byed pa dag /de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid yin/ /ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon/ /ha cang zhum pa rtag tu brnyas/ /de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su/ /go 'phang bar ma bsten par bya/ /res 'ga' lkugs pa'am 'on pa lta bur gyis/ /dus la bab nas bdag bzhin du smros/ /res 'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis/ /dus la bab na me lce bzhin du spor/ /res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra bar zhum par bya/ /dus la bab na ri rab lta bur gyis/ /res 'ga' rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bar bya/ /dus la bab na thub 'dra nags su song / /res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya/ /dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang / /nor phyir bran bzhin bkol par mi bya ste/ /khro ba'i dbang du gyur par mi bya'o/ /res 'ga' dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis/ /rtse zhing sha dang chang yang spyad par bya/ /res 'ga' ri dgas lta bur 'jigs bzhin song / /dus su gcan gzan bzhin du nyams rtsal bstan/ /dang por dus dang dus min dang / /bdag nyid stobs ldan stobs med dang / /dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su/ /de nas don rnams legs par brtsam/ /bzod med rnams la bzod pa dang / /bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis/ /nyam chung rnams la'ang bzod pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rtag bzod gyis/ /'khon gyis 'khon zhir nams kyang mi 'gyur

414
072-207b bas/ /bzod med rnams la'ang bzod par byas na legs/ /khros pa rnams la rtag tu dang ba dang / /gzhan gyi skyon rnams rtag tu bcab par gyis/ /gtso bo rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang / /'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab gcugs gyur phyir bzod/ /gang zhig 'og ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa/ /de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs/ /gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /blo gros chung ngu mi bzod de/ /pad ma la ni rdo char bzhin/ /gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /mkhas pa shin tu bzod byed de/ /glang chen me tog char pa bzhin/ /khro ba dang ni brdzun dag dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /mkhas pa shes rab ldan gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni thams cad bzod/ /rdo ba bsregs kyang 'ju mi 'gyur/ /char pa bab kyang 'jig pa med/ /de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /mkhas pa nyams par 'gyur ba med/ /gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa/ /de la mkhas pas bzod par byed/ /bden pa ma yin pa yang bzod/ /de las gzhan pa bstan du med/ /'di ltar skyes bu mkhas pa nor gyi phyir/ /sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bar bya/ /gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnam spangs te/ /gzhan du song na stong phrag rnyed dang 'dra/ /yal ga snyegs la 'ju bar mi bya zhing / /chags bral sems la chags par mi bya ste/ /bzang zhing sdug pas sa steng gang bas na/ /'jig rten yangs pa gzhan du 'gror zad mod/ /gang na brnyas byed bkur sti mi byed dang / /smod par byed cing sdod par mi byed na/ /mkhas dang blun 'grogs ched ka mi che bas/ /rang rgyal bzhin du ma smra de 'gro rigs/ /gang na skyes bu 'thab la dga' gyur nas/ /g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu glags kyang byed/ /kyal pa dbyen brdzun tshig rtsub smra byed pa/ /de

415
072-208a tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams 'tsho bar byed gyur nas/ /phan tshun gnod la 'bebs par dga' ba dang / /lus dang ngag yid sdom pa med gyur pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams phrag dog byed gyur nas/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing / /sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam rmongs tshul 'chos pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas/ /bkur sti 'dod cing tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu byed/ /nang yang ma dag phyi yang ma dag pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams zhe sa med gyur nas/ /ya rabs tshul med khengs shing nga rgyal la ldan/ /byis pas mkhas pa rtag tu brnyas byed pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang dang gang du bza' btung dang / /gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang / /gang du 'tsho ba der song la/ /chags 'gyur gnas su ma 'dug cig /lan 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yinaspongs/ /rtag khengs mchod med nga rgyal gang yinaspongs/ /'bras bu ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs/ /phongs dus mi lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs/ /me yis gang ba'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs/ /byas gzo med pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod chagaspongs/ /mche ba mi bzad klu 'dra'i chags pa spongs/ /dgra bo mtshon thogs lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs/ /klu mo lta bu mi bzad chung ma spongs/ /mgo la me 'bar lta bu'i bu rnams thong / /'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thong / /btung ba dug chen lta bu'i 'dod pa thong / /khyim gyi phyir ni gcig btang ste/ /grong khyer don du khyim btang ngo / /ljongs kyi phyir ni grong khyer te/ /bdag gi don du sa btang ngo / /mi yi yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing / /srog gi don du yan lag gtang bar bya/ /nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog /thams cad btang gi

416
072-208b 'dir ni chos srung ngo / /chos spyod pa la 'jigs skrag med pa nyid/ /chos spyod pa dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/ /chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'gro bar 'gro/ /chos mi spyod pa shi nas gdung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /nor zad na yang blo gros mi 'khyim par/ / 'jig rten dag na ci dgar legs rgyu ba/ /sems can nang na mi yi snying por chud/ /gang zhig dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing / /nga rgyal 'tshe ba rnam spangs bden la gnas/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni/ /dpa' bo rtul phod ya rabs thabs ldan yin/ /gang zhig de dang de la legs bslabs pas/ /don rnams kun la mkhas par gyur pa dang / /des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni/ /dam pas legs pa yin zhes bsngags pa mdzad/ /nye rngas smras pa/ rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing / /'di bdag ni rab tu dad/ /bdag gi lus 'di bskams pa'am/ /yang na sems ni med kyang sla/ /sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad par/ /lhung yang phyin chad sdig mi bgyid/ /tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas/ /tshul khrims ldan pa shi yang sla/ /skye ba gcig tu 'di yi phyir/ /ji lta bur ni mi zad sbyang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe gang du rab gnas shing / /de dang der ni skyes pa na/ /mi dge'i grogs dang 'grogs pa yis/ /nga yi mi dge las rnams byas/ /dge ba'i bshes dang phrad pa na/ /mi dge'i las rnams spangs pa yis/ /bdag gis mi dge'i las rnams bsal/ / bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams mngon mkhyen nas/ /de phyir dge slong rnams la ni/ /thub pas lung yang bstan par mdzad/ /sngon tshe nga ni rngar gyur te/ /kun dga' bo ni nye rnga yin/ /lha sbyin rnga sgrar gyur to zhes/ /skyes rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis/ / chos rnams sdud par byed pa yi/ /don rgyas mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /dge slong thams cad gus bcas par/ /chos la spyad pa nyid du gyis/ /klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //
